meanings.sent1: The generals led the troops into battle.
meanings.sent2: The generals strategized the attack on the enemy base.
meanings.sent3: The generals decided to have a dance-off instead of a war.
meanings.sent4: The generals' wisdom was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The image of the generals in their uniforms was striking.

meanings.definition: A group of high-ranking military officers.
meanings.sent1: The council of generals discussed the battle plans.
meanings.sent2: The generals gathered to review the mission objectives.
meanings.sent3: The generals held a bake-off to determine the best chef among them.
meanings.sent4: The generals stood united like a fortress against the enemy.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the generals instilled confidence in the soldiers.

meanings.sent1: She gave a generals overview of the project.
meanings.sent2: The report provided only generals information about the incident.
meanings.sent3: His directions were so generals that everyone got lost.
meanings.sent4: The painting was beautiful, with generals strokes of color.
meanings.sent5: The recipe was easy to follow with generals instructions.
